definition: to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱

sentences.english: We regret that we are unable to consider your request for payment under D/A terms.
sentences.chinese: 對你方要求以承兌交單方式付款一事，我們謙難考慮。

sentences.english: We can't agree to draw at 30 days D/A.
sentences.chinese: 我們不同意開具30天期的承兌交單匯票。

sentences.english: It would help us greatly if you would accept D/A.
sentences.chinese: 若貴方能接收承兌交單方式付款，則兌偶方幫忙很大。

sentences.english: For our guests' convenience, traveler's checks cashed here.
sentences.chinese: 爲方便本店旅客，本處承兌旅行支票。

sentences.english: The payer of an ECD shall be the acceptor.
sentences.chinese: 電子商業匯票的付款人爲承兌人。

sentences.english: Our terms of payment are normally 30 - day bill of exchange, documents against acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 我們的付款方式一般是30天遠期匯票，承兌交單。

sentences.english: The obligation of the acceptor thereof arises out of the purchase of goods from the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 本匯票承兌人的義務因向出票人購買貨物而產生。

sentences.english: Could you agree to a payment by D/A?
sentences.chinese: 你方願意接受承兌交單方式付款嗎？

sentences.english: We honored the check the overdraft was only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 我們承兌這張支票的透支額唯有5元。

sentences.english: The bill of exchange was signed by the acceptor.
Could you make an exception and accept D/A or D/P?
sentences.chinese: 你們能不能破例接受承兌交單或付款交單？

sentences.english: We honored the check considering overdraft was only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 我們承兌這張支票的透支額惟有5元。

sentences.english: Can be received within six months of bank acceptance bills of exchange.
sentences.chinese: 可收受六個月內的銀行承兌匯票。

sentences.english: We honored the check as the overdraft am only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 咱們承兌這張支票的透支額只有5元。

sentences.english: Acceptance to apply for the discount.
sentences.chinese: 向銀行申請承兌匯票貼現。
